        public Cancelable broadcast(Transaction transaction,
                            Callback<kotlin.Unit> callback)

        broadcast transaction to DCore

        Parameters:
        transaction - transaction to broadcast
        callback - a callback object that asynchronously receives the result value or error
        Returns:
        a request handler object which can be used to cancel the request

      • broadcast

        public Cancelable broadcast(ECKeyPair privateKey,
                            java.util.List<? extends ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.BaseOperation> operations,
                            org.threeten.bp.Duration expiration,
                            Callback<kotlin.Unit> callback)

        broadcast operations to DCore

        Parameters:
        privateKey - private key
        operations - operations to be submitted to DCore
        expiration - transaction expiration in seconds, after the expiry the transaction is removed from recent pool and will be dismissed if not included in DCore block
        callback - a callback object that asynchronously receives the result value or error
        Returns:
        a request handler object which can be used to cancel the request
